'''"Swirling Scene in a Bottle"''' is an [[Item]] used to unlock the [[Swirling Isles]] realm layout in the [[Serenitea Pot]]. It can be purchased from [[Tubby]] in the [[Realm Depot]] after completing the {{Quest|Lies Cast Shadows Under Gathered Lights}}.
